metadata.title: CVE-2024-22667 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Vim before 9.0.2142 has a stack-based buffer overflow becausedid_set_langmap in map.c calls sprintf to write to the error buffer that ispassed down to the option callback functions.

criterions.comment: vim package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
